allow:
Bash(bash -c '
INPUT_DIR=""./input""
OUTPUT_DIR=""./output""
ARCHIVE_DIR=""./archive""

for filepath in ""$INPUT_DIR""/*.txt ""$INPUT_DIR""/*.md; do
  [ -f ""$filepath"" ] || continue
  filename=$\(basename ""$filepath""\)
  timestamp=$\(date ""+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S""\)
  echo ""[$timestamp] 새로운 파일 발견: $filename""
  echo ""[$timestamp] 분석을 시작합니다...""
  
  outfile=""$OUTPUT_DIR/summary_${filename%.*}_$\(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S\).md""
  if claude --print ""\\""$filepath\\"" 파일을 읽고 핵심 내용을 요약해서 마크다운 형식으로 작성해줘. 한국어로 작성해줘."" > ""$outfile"" 2>&1; then
    mv ""$filepath"" ""$ARCHIVE_DIR/${filename%.*}_$\(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S\).${filename##*.}""
    echo ""[$\(date ""+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S""\)] 완료: $filename""
  else
    echo ""[$\(date ""+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S""\)] 실패: $filename""
  fi
done
')

Bash(powershell -Command "foreach \($d in @\(''input'',''output'',''archive'',''logs''\)\) { New-Item -Path ''C:\\Users\\user\\OneDrive - 강도원\\문서\\Obsidian_KDW\\KDW\\1. Projects\\pdf-watcher'' -Name $d -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null }; Write-Host ''Created pdf-watcher folders''")

Bash(powershell -Command "$dirs = @\(''input'',''output'',''archive'',''logs''\); foreach \($d in $dirs\) { New-Item -Path \(''C:\\Users\\user\\OneDrive - 강도원\\문서\\Obsidian_KDW\\KDW\\1. Projects\\pdf-watcher\\'' + $d\) -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null }; Write-Host ''Created pdf-watcher folders''")

Bash(cmd /c "powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File NUL -Command ""$shell = New-Object -ComObject Shell.Application; $f = $shell.Namespace\([string]''C:\\Users\\user\\OneDrive - 강도원\\문서\\Obsidian_KDW\\KDW\\1. Projects''\); $i = $f.ParseName\(''test''\); if \($i -ne $null\) { $i.InvokeVerb\(''delete''\); Write-Host ''Done'' } else { Write-Host ''Not found'' }""")
